name: AmericanGirlAdventures
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: american girl
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Parents, you and your child are invited to join your favorite American Girl characters! Visit Julie at her home in San Francisco, go on a musical tour with Melody in Detroit, and discover countless adventures every month. Explore their worlds, learn about their stories, play their games, and, of course, have sleepovers!

Julie, Melody, and many other favorite American Girl characters invite you and your child to enjoy unforgettable experiences with them. Just say, “Alexa, open American Girl” to start.

Parents can subscribe to American Girl Plus to unlock the full game*. Get special extras as an American Girl Plus Member. Meet more characters, play new games, and enjoy additional sleepover activities. American Girl Plus is also available as part of FreeTime Unlimited.

Play American Girl: Adventures on Echo, Echo Show, and many other Alexa enabled devices. Please note: FireTV devices are not currently supported.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

American Girl: Adventures skill is for kids and fans aged 6+.

This skill requires Alexa’s parental consent by an adult in the household (if not already granted). Visit https://www.amazon.com/myh/vpc/intro?clientId=Alexa_rw_vpc to give consent through your Amazon account. 

*Voice purchase settings are available in your Alexa App. 

NOTE: Disabling the skill will cause you to lose your game progress. 

© 2020 American Girl. American Girl and associated trademarks are owned by American Girl, LLC.
priv:
